text: Glória Maria Matta da Silva (15 August 1949 – 2 February 2023) was a Brazilian journalist, reporter, and television host. With a career that spanned since the 1960s, she is widely considered the first television reporter and TV host of African descent to achieve national success in Brazil. Category:1949 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Brazilian television presenters
title: Glória Maria
